title: 820-00138 vs 00138-A
message: Hi guys working on an 820-00138-A with no backlight. I only have schematcs for the 820-00138 but they layout doesnt match. Is there anything similar to 820-00138-A that I can use? I need to know the board layout faround U7701, have a burned pin and I expect its 5V line but not sure so its kinda risky to try and fix.
